name: Poker
section_order: Poker Hands in order of rank

Poker Hands in order of rank.val: Five cards in sequence, all of the same suit
Four cards of one rank and any other card
Three matching cards of one rank and two matching cards of another rank
All five cards of the same suit, but not in sequence
Five cards of sequential rank in at least two different suits
Three cards of the same rank, plus two cards of another rank
Two cards of the same rank, plus two cards of another rank that match each other but not the first pair, plus any card not of either rank
Two cards of one rank, plus three cards which are not of this rank nor the same as each other
No hand is made, and the only thing of any potential meaning in the hand is the highest card
